abstract.p: Aspects of the present invention include one or more of capturing educational presentations by presenters using instructional aids, making presentations available via the World Wide Web to users of educational services, aiding users in the selection of a particular topic and a particular presenter, rewarding students for achievement, and financially compensating presenters in accordance with the popularity of their educational presentations.

Aspects of the present invention include one or more of capturing educational presentations by presenters using instructional aids, making productions of these presentations available over an Internet connection to consumers of educational services, aiding selection of a particular topic and a particular presenter, and financially compensating presenters in accordance with the popularity of their educational presentations.

Aspects of the present invention include one or more of capturing educational presentations by presenters using instructional aids, making productions of these presentations available over an Internet connection to consumers of educational services, aiding selection of a particular topic and a particular presenter, and financially compensating presenters in accordance with the popularity of their educational presentations.

Aspects of the present invention include one or more of capturing educational presentations by presenters using instructional aids, making productions of these presentations available over an Internet connection to consumers of educational services, aiding selection of a particular topic and a particular presenter, and financially compensating presenters in accordance with the popularity of their educational presentations.
Des aspects de la présente invention comprennent une ou plusieurs des étapes suivantes : capturer des présentations éducatives par des présentateurs utilisant des auxiliaires pédagogiques
réaliser des productions de ces présentations disponibles sur Internet à l'intention de consommateurs de services éducatifs
faciliter la sélection d'un sujet particulier et d'un présentateur particulier
et rémunérer financièrement les présentateurs en fonction de la popularité de leurs présentations éducatives.
